page.title: 12A Wednesday in Harraton.
page.content: {Clare Arundel writes:- One Wednesday I woke up and got out of bed.My clothes were at the bottom of the bed.I took them to the bathroom and got washed.I could not go down because the burglar alarm was still on so I read a book until my Mam got up to switch it off.She made breakfast, brushed my hair,then gave me a packet of chicken crisps.I got my coat and school bag and went to call on my friend.When we got to school we had a big assembly(the whole school) and went to Maths.After that we had break, we played with my skipping rope.We had English,we did poems,and then went home for dinner.I had soup and toast then played out until it was time to go back.That afternoon we went down Firtree Avenue with our boards for the Domesday Project.We looked at all the houses then came back to school.
